IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE ANTICOAGULATION FORUM IS A MULTIDISCIPLINARY NONPROFIT ORGANIZATION OF HEALTH CARE PROFESSIONALS THAT WILL IMPROVE THE QUALITY OF CARE FOR PATIENTS TAKING ANTITHROMBOTIC MEDICATIONS
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE ANTICOAGULATION FORUM IS A MULTIDISCIPLINARY NONPROFIT ORGANIZATION OF HEALTH CARE PROFESSIONALS THAT WILL IMPROVE THE QUALITY OF CARE FOR PATIENTS TAKING ANTITHROMBOTIC MEDICATIONS
IRS990.Desc: PROVIDING EDUCATION AND NETWORKING OPPORTUNITIES FOR HEALTH CARE PROFESSIONALS. PROMOTING THE CLINICAL APPLICATION OF EVIDENCE-BASED PRACTICES. FACILITATING RESEARCH AIMED AT IMPROVING HEALTH OUTCOMES. INFORMING HEALTHCARE POLICY, REGULATORY AGENCIES, AND INDUSTRY ABOUT BEST PRACTICES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS APPROVES THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTORS COMPENSATION
THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR REVIEWS THE FORM 990
NO OTHER DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC
THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS HELD SCHEDULED MEETINGS AND KEPT WRITTEN MINUTES OF MEETING
EACH BOARD MEMBER HAD VOTING POWER
